name: The Bastonnes
description:
The Bastonnes is an action tactical game. You have four members in your family, each has his own ability. Choose wisely your action to take advantage on your opponents.

In each round, choose your 1st, 2nd and 3rd action. Once all players have prepared their actions, they are all being played in random order between each family.

Combat in a multiplayer game up to 4 players or AI.
A unique turn based game combining strategy, action and sacrifice.

Strongest family will survive

  • Prepare your actions: Choose your action in order and try to anticipate other’s actions.
  • Random Seats: Each game can have random seat assignments.
  • Abilities: Some family members can only hit their neighbor or facing seats. So position your members wisely
  • Special Actions: Catch the mystery case and get special actions such as Dynamite, Control or Exchange
